properties.areaDesc: Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 14 at 2:11AM CST until February 14 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds around 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60
NM, Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60
NM and Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal
City LA from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING
